name: disable
flavor_text: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.
effect_text_extend: Disables the target's last used move, preventing its use for 4â€“7 turns, selected at random, or until the target leaves the field.  If the target hasn't used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed,  if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, or if it already has a move disabled, this move will fail.
effect_text_simple: Disables the target's last used move for 1-8 turns.
